mapper.insert: insert ignore into totalstats (id, fpa, fgm, fg, _3pa, _3pm, _3fg, _2pa, _2pm, _2fg, _1pa, _1pm, _1fg, rebs, orebs, blks, fouls, ofouls, stls, asts, tos, total_score) values (#{id},#{fpa},#{fgm},#{fg},#{_3pa},#{_3pm},#{_3fg},#{_2pa},#{_2pm},#{_2fg},#{_1pa},#{_1pm},#{_1fg}, #{rebs},#{orebs},#{blks},#{fouls},#{ofouls},#{stls},#{asts},#{tos},#{total_score})
mapper.update: update totalstats set fpa=#{fpa}, fgm=#{fgm}, fg=#{fg}, _3pa=#{_3pa}, _3pm=#{_3pm}, _3fg=#{_3fg}, _2pa=#{_2pa}, _2pm=#{_2pm}, _2fg=#{_2fg}, _1pa=#{_1pa}, _1pm=#{_1pm}, _1fg=#{_1fg}, rebs=#{rebs}, orebs=#{orebs}, blks=#{blks}, fouls=#{fouls}, ofouls=#{ofouls}, stls=#{stls}, asts=#{asts}, tos=#{tos}, total_score=#{total_score} where id=#{id}
